backend/main.mo: Implements user profile management, role-based access control, and contact form submission with admin‑restricted retrieval and spam checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files and components.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment variable file showing optional build metadata settings.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH‑based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file loading the React app and preloading the hero background image.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Describes production configuration covering admin access, RBAC behavior, contact form spam protection, and security notes.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Provides deployment instructions and explains draft vs live environments for production builds.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Outlines post‑deployment smoke tests for landing page, offers, and contact form functionality in production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root layout, lazy‑loaded offer/admin routes, and routing structure using TanStack Router with a global backend health check.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays login or access‑denied messaging for admin users, handling Internet Identity authentication and logout.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Buil: Shows build metadata such as host, mode, version, and timestamp with console logging for diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Implements a validated contact form with bot‑detection timing logic and submission via a custom mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Renders the contact area with contact options and the contact form integrated into a two‑column layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Shows site footer with social links, contact shortcuts, and the build environment indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Defines the hero banner with main branding, intro text, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the homepage layout with background imagery and all main sections including hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Renders a landing-page section listing feature cards that link to individual offer pages with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Displays an individual review with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer name in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Shows a reviews section containing multiple curated review cards and a TripAdvisor CTA button.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: Reusable CTA link that routes to the home page and scrolls to the contact section via hash navigation.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Exports a list of country calling code options including values, abbreviations, and labels.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Defines and exports an array of hardcoded customer reviews used for the reviews section.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Provides structured content data for offer detail pages, including metadata and multi-section text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing it on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrapAcce: Empty file placeholder for admin bootstrap access logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContactSubmis: Hook to fetch all contact submissions via the actor with error handling for authorization failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPasswordLogin: Empty file placeholder for admin password login logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Performs a one-time backend health check using the actor, logging diagnostic info and tracking status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Uses the authenticated actor to query whether the current user is an admin, exposing loading and fetched states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph data, Twitter tags, and optional article JSON-LD based on provided SEO config.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecaptchaV3.ts: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Scrolls smoothly to a DOM element matching the URL hash whenever the hash changes.
Submits contact form data through the backend actor and returns a mutation with error parsing and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, theming, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Determines whether to show admin submissions, access denied, or loading state based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactSubmissi: Displays and manages admin contact submissions with backend health checks, selection UI, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/diagnostics/DraftVsLi: Diagnostics page that displays environment details and backend health status to compare draft and live deployments.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Offer detail page rendering the 'Choose Your Own Adventure' post with SEO setup, article sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Offer detail page for the 'Flexible As Hell' experience, loading post content, SEO metadata, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Offer detail page for the 'Off the Beaten Path' post, showing title, sections, and a final contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Offer page presenting the 'Private and Personal' content with SEO config, structured sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Offer detail page showcasing the 'Stay Your Way' post with article content, SEO settings, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Offer page for the 'Stories and Banter' experience, rendering post sections and including SEO and a CTA.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for reCAPTCHA definitions.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Converts a bigint nanosecond timestamp to a formatted US locale date-time string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugin settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing deployment issues, existing features, and new feature requests for draft-vs-live diagnostics and canister identity reporting.
